analyses.title: Sales Volume Analysis
analyses.context: Evaluate the overall sales activity within the cafe.

sub_analyses.title: Total Transactions
sub_analyses.why: To understand the number of transactions processed.

sub_analyses.title: Total Units Sold
sub_analyses.why: To measure the volume of items sold.

sub_analyses.title: Total Sales Revenue
sub_analyses.why: To calculate the revenue generated from sales.

analyses.title: Item Popularity Analysis
analyses.context: Identify which items are sold most frequently.

sub_analyses.title: Top Selling Items
sub_analyses.why: To determine the most frequently sold items.
answers: List of top items by sales volume.

sub_analyses.title: Item Revenue Contribution
sub_analyses.why: To assess which items contribute most to revenue.

analyses.title: Payment Method Analysis
analyses.context: Examine the preferred methods of payment utilized by customers.

sub_analyses.title: Payment Method Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To understand the breakdown of payment methods used.
answers: Percentage of each payment method used.

analyses.title: Location-Based Sales Analysis
analyses.context: Analyze sales performance across different cafe locations.

sub_analyses.title: Sales by Location
sub_analyses.why: To compare sales performance between locations.

analyses.title: Temporal Sales Trends
analyses.context: Detect sales patterns over time to aid future forecasting.

sub_analyses.title: Daily Sales Volume
sub_analyses.why: To analyze how sales vary day-to-day.

sub_analyses.title: Monthly Sales Trends
sub_analyses.why: To understand the trends in sales over various months.
